import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

---
Login By Authid
---
Gunakan endpoint ini untuk melihat **Login By Authid**.

---

## ðŸ§­ Endpoint
| Atribut | Nilai |
|----------|-------|
| **URL** | `https://api.hesda-store.com/v2/cek_sesi_login?hesdastore={API_KEY}auth_id={AUTH_ID}` |
| **Method** | `GET` |
| **Auth** | Basic Auth (`Authorization: email & password`) |
| **Content-Type** | `application/json` |

---

## ðŸ“¥ Params

| Nama | Tipe | Wajib | Keterangan |
|------|------|--------|-------------|
| `hesdastore` | `string` | âœ… | `API Key` |
| `auth_id` | `string` | âœ… | `auth_id dari List auth session` |
| `no_hp` | `number` | âœ… | `Nomor XL Kamu` |

---

:::info ðŸ§ª Response JSON

Beberapa contoh response berdasarkan status transaksi:

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="success" label="ðŸŸ¢ Success">
    ```json
    {
        "status": true,
        "message": "Data ditemukan",
        "data": [
            {
                "auth_id": "603312:eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJhZTQzZmFiZi1iOGFlLTQxYmUtOGUwOS1iODJkYWM3NGU4MjAifQ..u6kL-vvYHQTwWe_hAEPz6CPxw9AM1wpHP6-HbGT_HKU",
                "time": "2025-10-03 08:39 WIB"
            }
        ]
    }
    ```
  </TabItem>

  <TabItem value="failed" label="ðŸ”´ Failed">
    ```json
    {
        "status": false,
        "message": "Nomor tidak ditemukan!",
        "data": []
    }
    ```
  </TabItem>

</Tabs>

:::
